name: Contrast (itch) (Reamuji)
description:
read desc first pls
K & L to change the screen contrast | WASD to move

avoid jumping near the wall, i haven't implement composite collider so it might stop you when jumping

A platformer where you only could step on area that is darker than you, but you could change your screen contrast which wont affect your player color

Made in 3 hour for Trijam #102 : Contrast. its been a while since last time i made a game. ill update the game when i got time and im feeling like it
